science.headline: Mitigating emissions from air freight: Unlocking the potential of SAF with book and claim
science.teaser: Emissions from air freight have increased by 25% since 2019, according to a 2024 analysis by environmental advocacy organization Stand.Earth. science.tldr: Reduces greenhouse gas emissions from air freight significantly
